english: structural particle; to get, obtain; must, have to

etymology.description: 得(得) (de/dé/děi, 'to get, obtain; must, have to') is an ideogrammic compound representing the act of obtaining valuables.
etymology.interpretation: The character 得 represents the action of picking up a cowry, which was historically a valuable item. This evokes the idea of obtaining something of worth.

examples.english: I have to go to work.
He received a lot of support.
